project_descr: The preparation of the National Climate Change Capacity Building Project will draw on the results of the national carbon reduction programme and support key stakeholders, to implement their findings and recommendations.

outputs.output_descr: Trinidad and Tobago Context-assessment for the preparation of the National Climate Change Capacity Building Project seeks to assist the national team responsible for the preparation of Trinidad and Tobago's Low Emissions Capacity Building
Development of Intended Nationally Determined Contributions (INDCs) into the Low Emission Capacity Building (LECB) project
